resources.string: By selecting Wake Up Call, you are enabling PARKansas to access your phone\'s Alarm Clock. PARKansas will not keep track of this alert as it will be stored on your phone\'s current alarm system. We recommend you set an alarm before 7:00 AM (Ticketing Time).
Don\'t show me this message again.
Set a time you would like to leave.
Your paid parking will expire in 10 minutes
What do you want to leave?
Your car will be towed at 11:59 PM
Your car will be towed at 11:59 PM

Cody Campbell: UI design and Database.
Dakota Hawkins: Map design and Search.
If you would like to contact us regarding question, comment or concern, click on text.
Alerts Activity: Allow the user to set different types of alerts.
Your car will be towed at
Your car will be towed at
No upcoming sports events on campus

Free Parking available prior to 7 AM every morning during the week and all day during the weekend. Note: This does not apply to the Harmon Garage, Resident Reserved, and wherever else noted otherwise.
Only use these alerts if parked at the Union Garage, short-term, or long-term parking meters

The cost for hourly parking is $1.00 for 39 minutes or $16.00 per day. Vehicles leaving the facility within 20 minutes of entering will not have to pay for parking. A driver who exits more than 20 minutes from the entry time will pay the full rate for parking.
If you notice something wrong with PARKansas and would like to report it, you can email the development team at team.m.parkansas@gmail.com
Lots 74, 74 A, 74 B, 74 C, and 74 E are located across the street from the track parking lot. On average, there are 369 open spots available in all these lots combined.
At any given point in time, there are over 1,200 parking spots available.
Lots 4, 5, 7, 8 and 61 require a permit between 7 AM and 8 PM Monday through Thursday and 7 AM to 5 PM on Friday.
The Parking and Transit department is undergoing a major change with all lots. These changes include the paving of lot 40 C and the changing of most times of lots on campus.
Harmon is open to the public at all times and requires payment between 7 AM and 1 AM Monday through Thursday; and Fridays from 7 AM to 6:15 PM.
